products.title: Espresso
products.description: Rich and bold espresso, perfect for a quick caffeine fix.

products.title: Latte
products.description: Smooth and creamy latte made with steamed milk and a shot of espresso.

products.title: Cappuccino
products.description: A balanced blend of espresso, steamed milk, and a frothy top.

products.title: Americano
products.description: Espresso with hot water added, making for a strong and smooth cup.

products.title: Mocha
products.description: Chocolatey mocha with espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup.

products.title: Macchiato
products.description: Espresso marked with just a splash of frothy milk.

products.title: Flat White
products.description: Rich espresso with velvety milk, a smooth and creamy coffee.

products.title: Cortado
products.description: Balanced and bold, equal parts espresso and warm milk.

products.title: Iced Coffee
products.description: Chilled coffee served over ice, refreshing and energizing.

products.title: Nitro Cold Brew
products.description: Cold brew coffee infused with nitrogen for a creamy and smooth texture.
